title: What is an iPhone?
content: - The iPhone is a line of smartphones designed and marketed by Apple Inc.
It features a touchscreen interface, a multi-touch display, and a wide range of apps.
iPhones are known for their sleek design, powerful hardware, and user-friendly operating system.
image_desc: A close-up image of an iPhone with its screen displaying a variety of apps.
narration: The iPhone is a revolutionary smartphone that has changed the way we communicate, access information, and entertain ourselves. It's a sleek and powerful device with a user-friendly interface and a wide range of apps that cater to every need.
